Class javax.speech.synthesis.SpeakableEvent

This class implements Serializable.

Serialized Form - Methods

No readObject or writeObject method declared.

Serialized Form - Fields

markerType

int markerType
Marker type for a MARKER_REACHED event.

See Also:
getMarkerType, ELEMENT_OPEN, ELEMENT_CLOSE, ELEMENT_EMPTY

text

String text
The text associated with the SpeakableEvent.

wordEnd

int wordEnd
Index of last character of of word in JSML text for a WORD_STARTED event.

See Also:
WORD_STARTED, getWordEnd

wordStart

int wordStart
Index of first character of of word in JSML text for a WORD_STARTED event.

See Also:
WORD_STARTED, getWordStart

Class javax.speech.synthesis.SynthesizerEvent

This class implements Serializable.

Serialized Form - Methods

No readObject or writeObject method declared.

Serialized Form - Fields

topOfQueueChanged

boolean topOfQueueChanged
topOfQueueChanged is true for QUEUE_UPDATED event when the top item in the speech output queue has changed.

See Also:
getTopOfQueueChanged

Package javax.speech.recognition

Class javax.speech.recognition.GrammarEvent

This class implements Serializable.

Serialized Form - Methods

No readObject or writeObject method declared.

Serialized Form - Fields

definitionChanged

boolean definitionChanged
True if the grammar's definition has changed with a GRAMMAR_CHANGES_COMMITTED event. False for other event types.

See Also:
getDefinitionChanged

enabledChanged

boolean enabledChanged
True if the grammar's enabled property has changed with a GRAMMAR_CHANGES_COMMITTED event. False for other event types.

See Also:
getEnabledChanged

grammarException

GrammarException grammarException
Non-null if any error is detected in a grammar's definition while producing a GRAMMAR_CHANGES_COMMITTED event. null for other event types.

See Also:
getGrammarException

Class javax.speech.recognition.GrammarException

This class implements Serializable.

Serialized Form - Methods

No readObject or writeObject method declared.

Serialized Form - Fields

details

GrammarSyntaxDetail[] details

Class javax.speech.recognition.RecognizerAudioEvent

This class implements Serializable.

No readObject or writeObject method declared.

Serialized Form - Fields

audioLevel

float audioLevel
Audio level defined on a scale from 0 to 1.

See Also:
getAudioLevel

Class javax.speech.recognition.RecognizerEvent

This class implements Serializable.

Serialized Form - Methods

No readObject or writeObject method declared.

Serialized Form - Fields

grammarException

GrammarException grammarException
Non-null if any error is detected in a grammar's definition while producing a CHANGES_COMMITTED event. null for other event types. The exception serves the same functional role as the GrammarException thrown on the commitChanges method.

See Also:
getGrammarException, commitChanges

Class javax.speech.recognition.ResultEvent

This class implements Serializable.

Serialized Form - Methods

No readObject or writeObject method declared.

Serialized Form - Fields

tokenFinalized

boolean tokenFinalized
True if the ResultEvent indicates that one or more tokens have been finalized. Tokens may be finalized with any of the following result events: RESULT_CREATED, RESULT_UPDATED, RESULT_ACCEPTED, RESULT_REJECTED.

See Also:
isTokenFinalized

unfinalizedTokensChanged

boolean unfinalizedTokensChanged
True if the ResultEvent indicates that the unfinalized tokens have changed. The unfinalized tokens may change with the following result events: RESULT_CREATED, RESULT_UPDATED, RESULT_ACCEPTED, RESULT_REJECTED.

See Also:
isUnfinalizedTokensChanged

Class javax.speech.recognition.ResultStateError

This class implements Serializable.

Serialized Form - Methods

No readObject or writeObject method declared.

Class javax.speech.recognition.RuleAlternatives

This class implements Serializable.

Serialized Form - Methods

No readObject or writeObject method declared.

Serialized Form - Fields

rules

Rule[] rules
Set of alternative Rule objects.

weights

float[] weights
Array of weights for each alternative Rule or null if the rules are equally likely. If non-null, the weights array must have an identical length to the rules array.

Class javax.speech.recognition.RuleName

This class implements Serializable.

Serialized Form - Methods

No readObject or writeObject method declared.

Serialized Form - Fields

fullRuleName

String fullRuleName
The complete specified rulename. Maybe a fully-qualified rulename, qualified rulename, or simple rulename depending upon how the object is constructed.

packageName

String packageName
The rule's package name or null if not specified.

simpleGrammarName

String simpleGrammarName
The rule's simple grammar name or null if not specified.

simpleRuleName

String simpleRuleName
The simple rulename.
